Principles of Textures and Materials

This module covers the skills to produce texture assets to the standards of the Games Industry. You will learn how to create textures for both realistic and stylised assets using industry standard software packages and methodologies.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate knowledge of texture creation in relation to design principles and aesthetic requirements.

+  Investigate and apply different texture creation techniques using a variety of industry standard texturing and material generation packages.

+  Identify key visual features of surface materials and investigate solutions for recreating them in games.

+  Critically review the development of your texture solutions and evaluate the effectiveness of your chosen techniques in the pipeline.
